page.title: 16LEISURE, KINGSTON
page.content: There are several leisure centres in Kingston. The{Kingfisher}is in Fairfield road. The things you can do are squash, five-a-side soccer, swimming, sun beds, waterbikes and rafts. At{Tolworth Recreation Centre you can do squash, badminton, keep-fit, golf, volley-ball and there is a theatre called the Croft Theatre. There is an adventure playground in New Malden and eleven recreation grounds; Kingston has four, New Malden has five and Chessington one. There is one open space in Chessington, one in Tolworth, and one in Surbiton. There is one small park in Kingston and one in Surbiton. There is a playing field in Surbiton and a playground in Chessington.
